# Description

Andrik Becht is a postdoctoral researcher in the [SYNC lab](http://erasmus-synclab.nl/) and at the Youth & Family department, Utrecht University. His research is specifically aimed at understanding adolescents' identity development from both a neurobiological and contextual perspective (for instance, examining the role of parents and peers). Andrik also investigates possible consequences of ongoing identity uncertainty in adolescence, to ultimately answer the question why some adolescents thrive whereas others donâ€™t.

# Expertise

```{r radarPlot}

member_name <- "Andrik Becht"

OS_skills <- read_csv(here("static/OS_skills.csv")) %>%
  dplyr::filter(name %in% c("max", "min", member_name)) %>%
  dplyr::select(c("open source software", "data management", "data sharing", "reproducible analysis", "preregistration", "open access"))

# custom radar plot
radarchart(OS_skills,
  axistype = 0, seg = 10,
  pcol = alpha("#002328", 0.8), pfcol = alpha("#00B969", 0.6), plwd = 4, centerzero = TRUE, # polygon
  cglcol = "#7e7e7e", axislabcol = "#002328", caxislabels = seq(0, 10, 2), cglwd = 0.8 # grid
)

```
